ing: 1 tablespoon frozen mango juice concentrate, thawed
des: "Refreshing mango and watermelon mixes with fresh mint in this tasteful summer salad."
ins: Combine the baby greens, mango, watermelon, mint, feta cheese, and minced onion in a mixing bowl. Whisk the vinegar, olive oil, and mango juice concentrate together in a small bowl, and pour over the salad. Toss gently to evenly coat.
